name: Shawarma Combo
description: Two shawarma sandwiches served with golden fries, two garlic sauces, and pickles.

name: Seafood Special
description: A mouthwatering seafood feast featuring juicy shrimp, tender crab legs, sweet corn on the cob, soft potatoes, and fresh lemon slices — all seasoned with rich Cajun spices.

name: Mixed Grill Platter
description: A premium mix of flame-grilled chicken drumsticks, juicy sausages, tender steak, and smoky zucchini & eggplant. Served with roasted lemon, creamy potato salad, and a fresh green dip.

name: Stuffed Vine & Cabbage Leaves Box
description: A luxurious box of tender grape leaves stuffed with aromatic rice and herbs, alongside delicious cabbage rolls filled with a flavorful mix. Garnished with pomegranate seeds and fresh vegetables for a perfect bite.

name: Falafel Party Box
description: 12 mini falafel sliders made with crispy golden falafel, fresh vegetables, pickles, and creamy tahini sauce. Comes with extra dipping sauce and a side of tangy pickled veggies

name: Family Box
description: Four gourmet burgers: a spicy beef burger with jalapeños, a juicy mushroom Swiss burger, a grilled chicken avocado burger, and a hearty veggie burger.Paired with crispy crinkle-cut fries, golden onion rings, and sweet potato fries

name: Kebab Platter
description: A hearty mix of grilled chicken and beef kebabs served over saffron rice, with fresh salad, creamy hummus, warm pita bread, and garlic sauce on the side.

name: Crispy Combo Meal
description: 6 crispy chicken sandwiches (3 classic & 3 spicy) made with golden fried chicken, fresh lettuce, and soft burger buns. Served with 6 pieces of fried chicken (3 classic & 3 spicy), crispy French fries, creamy coleslaw, and two cocktail sauce dips.

name: Kabsa with Whole Chicken
description: A fragrant rice dish cooked with special Arabian spices, topped with a whole tender roasted chicken. Served with nuts and raisins for the perfect traditional feast.
